abstract: A team of S.&P. analysts has put together an intriguing shopping list for American companies looking for deals in Europe, with potential targets including AstraZeneca and Vivendi.
snippet: A team of S.&P. analysts has put together an intriguing shopping list for American companies looking for deals in Europe, with potential targets including AstraZeneca and Vivendi.
lead_paragraph: American companies looking to buy into Europe have gotten a little bit of help, thanks to Standard & Poor’s.

headline.main: For American Companies, a European Shopping List

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
